Posts.Content: hi,  you sound just like me. I found out a month before my 33rd birthday and I also have triple negative breast cancer. my little boy is 7. I'm on the same chemo also. I've just done my 2nd session. hair is all gone but I'm finding it ok. very tired all the time. I've just got my wig so trying to get used to that.  how u finding things?
Posts.Title: Chemo chat today
